metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20363 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
LibRaw::raw2image in libraw_cxx.cpp in LibRaw 0.19.1 has a NULL pointer dereference.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-20363` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.2-2
libraw20 - 0.19.2-2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> debian says https://github.com/LibRaw/LibRaw/commit/a7c17cb6bbec1e79f058d84511f9c3b142cbdfa7 is also needed

criterions.comment: darktable package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.2-2').
rawtherapee package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
